answers.answer: HiWelcome to the MedHelp forum!Take  multivitamin with Vitamin C. Use the tongue scarper gently for a few days or avoid if possible, Give the area time to heal for a week or so. If it persists consult a doctor. In all likelihood the sensation will return. If it does not you may have to test for diabetes.It is difficult to comment beyond this at this stage.  Please let me know if there is any thing else and do keep me posted. Take care!

question: After using a tongue scraper the second day i pressed down a little to hard an i drew blood and later noticed numbness in that area and  If so how long will last? Or have i permanently ruined my tongue?  PLEASE HELP!!!!!!!!Thank You,Sincerely,  YD
title: a little numbness in tongue
